name: Text Document
summary: Learn about .WTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Users most likely to encounter WTX files are those with Windows 7 configurations where WTX files are set as a default file type association for basic text editing. In some cases, software developers choose uncommon file extensions like .wtx to avoid conflicts with more common extensions (like .txt), especially if their program needs to recognize and handle certain text files differently.

instructions: You can open WTX files with any text editor, including Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (macOS), and gedit (Linux). You may need to change the .wtx file extension to .txt for the text editor to recognize the file type.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
